title: OnePlus Nord 2 receives OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 1 with April 2022 security patches
content:
After rolling out the first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta build based on Android 12 for the original OnePlus Nord earlier this month, OnePlus has now started rolling out the first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta release for the OnePlus Nord 2. The Open Beta update gives users a chance to experience all the new Android 12

The post OnePlus Nord 2 receives OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 1 with April 2022 security patches appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus has started rolling out OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 1 based on Android 12 to the OnePlus Nord 2. Download from the link in the post.
